data_maturity_score.evidence: Uses Palantir Foundry platform with structured data pipelines, workflows, and ontology objects. Mentions agile methodologies and documentation, but focused on single specialized platform rather than modern data stack

data_maturity_level.evidence: Structured processes with Palantir Foundry, documented data logic and lineage, agile development practices, but specialized platform focus

maturity_signals.evidence: Palantir Foundry adoption with ontology objects for data management, documented data logic and lineage for discoverability

scope_creep_score.evidence: Focused role on Palantir Foundry development with clear responsibilities, no mention of backend/frontend/ML combined roles

overtime_risk_score.evidence: Defense contractor with national security focus may have demanding timelines, but unlimited PTO and no explicit overtime mentions provide some balance

role_clarity.evidence: Well-defined responsibilities focused on Palantir Foundry data engineering, clear collaboration structure with Product Owner and other engineers

overall_red_flag_score.evidence: Moderate risk due to specialized tech stack, security clearance requirements, and defense industry demands, but clear role definition and good benefits

reporting_structure_clarity.evidence: Mentions collaboration with Product Owner and other Software & Data Engineers, but no specific manager or reporting structure detailed

manager_level_inferred.evidence: No specific manager level mentioned, only Product Owner collaboration and team structure without leadership hierarchy details

team_growth_velocity.evidence: Company mentions growth and expansion, building internal software capabilities, suggesting steady team expansion

value.team_size: small team of Software & Data Engineers
value.seniority_mix: mix of experience levels (1-5 years required)

team_composition.evidence: Mentions 'other Software & Data Engineers' suggesting small team, role requires 1-5 years experience indicating mixed seniority

reporting_structure.evidence: No specific reporting structure mentioned, only collaboration with Product Owner and team members

cross_functional_embedded.evidence: Mentions collaboration with stakeholders and users, working with Product Owner, suggesting embedded cross-functional work

work_life_balance_score.evidence: Unlimited PTO is positive, but defense contractor with national security focus may have demanding periods. No explicit work-hour expectations mentioned

growth_opportunities_score.evidence: Mentions work will 'directly shape company growth' but no specific career progression, learning budgets, or advancement opportunities detailed

tech_culture_score.evidence: Uses sophisticated Palantir Foundry platform with agile methodologies, but limited to single specialized technology rather than diverse modern stack

tech_culture_signals.evidence: No mention of open source contributions, tech blogs, conferences, hackathons, or innovation time

dev_practices_mentioned.evidence: Mentions designing and documenting data logic, lineage, and tooling for maintainability

innovation_signals.evidence: Focus on implementing and maintaining Palantir Foundry applications rather than exploring new technologies or innovation

tech_debt_awareness.evidence: No mention of tech debt management, modernization efforts, or improving existing systems

ai_integration_level.evidence: No explicit AI/ML mentioned in job description, focus is on data engineering and business intelligence applications within Palantir Foundry

ml_tools_expected.evidence: No ML/AI tools mentioned in job description

hiring_urgency.evidence: Position posted for minimum 3 days and remains open until filled, suggesting standard hiring timeline rather than urgent

competition_level.evidence: Specialized Palantir Foundry experience required with security clearance may limit applicant pool, but aerospace/defense is competitive field

company_stage_inferred.evidence: Established aerospace/defense company expanding internal software capabilities, mentions growth and building new teams

hiring_velocity.evidence: Building internal software capabilities suggests planned hiring rather than urgent backfill or aggressive expansion

team_size_signals.evidence: Mentions 'other Software & Data Engineers' suggesting small team, likely 2-5 people based on team structure description

funding_stage_signals.evidence: Established aerospace/defense company with comprehensive benefits and equity grants suggests profitable, mature business

role_creation_type.evidence: Building internal software capabilities and expanding data engineering team to support company growth

strength_details: Transparent salary range ($90,000-$115,000) with equity grants
Comprehensive benefits including unlimited PTO, health insurance, 401k
Clear role requirements and responsibilities focused on Palantir Foundry
Unlimited PTO policy supporting work-life balance
Opportunity to work on national security and aerospace projects
concern_details: Highly specialized in Palantir Foundry - may limit career flexibility
US citizenship/permanent residency required - no visa sponsorship
Onsite requirement in Berthoud, CO limits remote work options
Vague career growth and advancement opportunities
Defense industry may have demanding timeline periods
best_fit_details: Mid-level engineers (1-5 years) seeking specialized Palantir Foundry experience
Data engineers interested in aerospace/defense industry
Candidates already authorized to work in US without visa sponsorship needs
probe_details: Ask about team size and growth plans for Software & Data Engineering
Understand Palantir Foundry training and certification opportunities
Clarify career progression and advancement opportunities
Discuss work-life balance expectations in defense contractor environment
leverage_details: Palantir Foundry experience is highly specialized and valuable
Existing security clearance is major advantage for defense contractors
summary.overall_assessment: Specialized opportunity for mid-level data engineers interested in aerospace/defense using Palantir Foundry platform. Good compensation and benefits with clear role definition. Main trade-offs are technology specialization, US work authorization requirements, and onsite location in Colorado.
